text: Came here to try the hairy crab since it is in season. Ordered the set meal which we felt was worth it. Each dish is well executed but wished they had served the dishes in order for the food to stand out more eg appetiser first and mains before dessert. Wait staff were attentive and even helped us with the crabs. Crabs were good with lots of roe. As usual, Putien provides really good comfort food like the white Lor Mee and sweet & sour pork.  The great chilli sauce is their secret weapon above the competition as it elevates each dish to the next level.

My go to restaurant every time Im at Vivo. The food superb as always, service was good. You can eat and enjoy the harbor view if you sit inside. My forever favorite is sweet sour pork, and their meesua. Love it!!

Such a nice meal. Staff are very nice and helpful with valuable suggestions and recommendation.  Highly recommend people to come and try in this restaurant.
This place has great food! The staff is attentive and friendly, always ready to approach and help. The atmosphere is lively and comfortably casual. Currently there is no service charge.
